name: Estranged Entanglement Demo!
description:
Welcome to the demo for my Thesis Project for my Film Prod Undergrad! It's a story-adventure game in the style of Life is Strange and Silent Hill, and it all centers on a coming-of-age story that is universal to all! It has Cel-Shading, Tank-Controls, and Cinematic Angles that allow this story to unfold. I hope you try the game out and let me know your feedback! As well, check out the Storyboards and Concepts for the game!

The Google Docs for the Concpets

Additional Concept Art by Anika!
